altText: Bird Hunting Shooting Game Project Screenshot
title: Bird Hunting Shooting Game
description: Experience the real fun of shooting birds without harming anyone! This bird hunting game allows you to be your true bird hunter self in wild animal jungle adventure action game. Featuring 3D graphics, picturesque locations, real time different birds animation and lifelike birds noises, this bird hunter game is all about offering you a realistic bird hunting experience.

altText: Real Deal Thrift Hunter Project Screenshot
title: Real Deal Thrift Hunter
description: Put your thrift-hunting skills to the test! In Real Deal: Thrift Hunter, you'll be shown real items fetched from eBay and Poshmark, and your challenge is to guess their prices. Guess correctly and earn rewards! Use Power-Ups to freeze time, get hints, or summon Genee for help.

title: Kids Learning APP
description: Kids learning app focusing on different subjects like math's science etc.. Math subject has different worlds which are based on geographical location of contents and each continent has different lesson related to the subject.

altText: Wild Dinosaur Hunting Island Project Screenshot

description: Welcome to the real Dino Hunting Shooting. Enjoy real animal hunting game in jungle survival with all the new shooting games exciting levels and realistic hunting adventure experience with FPS Shooter sniper.

title: ASTRO ADVENTURES
description: A fun and engaging platformer game with markets to buy guns and coins to upgrade them.

title: Hungry Shark Hunter
description: Play Exciting Sea Animal Shark Shooting games. Angry shark is roaming around in the ocean waters, looking for someone to attack. You are all alone in ocean water away from the city, what will you do? Become the best sniper in Angry shark hunting games.

title: Angry Dino Hunting

title: Golf Game
description: Introducing the innovative Golf Game that integrates cutting-edge spirometry technology to measure the user's respiratory system. To play the game, users are required to provide their personal information, which is then utilized to generate a customized measurement of their lungs.

title: Dolphin Game
description: The Spirometry-based Gaming Container App merges interactive gaming with spirometry technology to measure lung capacity. With two engaging games, users play while their inhale and exhale values are recorded.

title: KINECT
description: Bubble popping game pop bubbles by copying user hand motion made with kinect using depth sensors and infrared cam.
